For example, we have implemented Google Analytics Demographic and Interest Reporting to provide site demographic reporting.
Typically, the information we share with these types of third party providers is provided through cookies or similar tracking technologies.

We permit third parties, such as ad networks and analytics providers, to collect information about your use of our website over time, in order that they may display ads that may be relevant to your interests or provide us with enhanced demographic and analytic information about our users.
